solution_line_template: If they are to save every month for three years to reach the target amount, and each year has {months_per_year} months, they'll save for {months_per_year}*{years_to_save} = <<{months_per_year}*{years_to_save}={total_months}>>{total_months} months.

If the house's downpayment is ${downpayment}, the total amount they both save per month is ${downpayment}/{total_months} = $<<{downpayment}/{total_months}={total_monthly_savings}>>{total_monthly_savings} every month.

Since they share the monthly savings, each person will pay ${total_monthly_savings}/{number_of_people}= =$<<{total_monthly_savings}/{number_of_people}={savings_per_person_per_month}>>{savings_per_person_per_month}
